data.text: Vinyo amachititsa munthu kukhala wonyoza ndipo chakumwa choledzeretsa chimachititsa munthu kukhala wolongolola;
Ukali wa mfumu uli ngati kubangula kwa mkango;
Nʼchaulemu kwa munthu kupewa mikangano,
Munthu waulesi satipula mʼmunda pa nthawi yoyenera;
Zolinga za mtima wa munthu zili ngati madzi akuya,
Anthu ambiri amayankhula za kukhulupirika kwawo,
Munthu wolungama amakhala ndi makhalidwe abwino;
Mfumu ikhala pa mpando wake wa chiweruzo,
Ndani amene anganene kuti, “Ndawuyeretsa mtima wanga;
Masikelo ndi miyeso ya zinthu imene ili yachinyengo
Ngakhale mwana amadziwika ndi zochita zake,
Makutu amene amamva ndi maso amene amaona,
Usakonde tulo ungasauke;
Munthu wogula chinthu amati, “Sichabwino, sichabwino.”
Pali golide ndi miyala yamtengowapatali,
Utenge chovala cha munthu amene waperekera mlendo chikole;
Chakudya chochipeza mwachinyengo chimukomera munthu,
Zokonzekera zimapindula utafunsira uphungu;
Amene amanka nanena miseche amawulula zachinsinsi.
Ngati munthu atemberera abambo ake kapena amayi ake,
Cholowa chochipeza mofulumira poyamba,
Usanene kuti, “Ine ndidzabwezera choyipa chimenechi!”
Miyeso yosintha imamunyansa Yehova;
Mayendedwe a munthu amawalamulira ndi Yehova,
Ndi msampha kwa munthu kuyankhula mofulumira kuti “Chinthu ichi nʼchopatulika kwa Yehova,”
Mfumu ya nzeru imapeta kwathunthu
Mpweya wa munthu uli ngati nyale ya Yehova;
Kukoma mtima ndi kukhulupirika ndizo zimasunga mfumu;
Ulemerero wa achinyamata uli mu mphamvu zawo,
Mikwingwirima yopweteka ndiyo imachotsa zoyipa,
